EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
TUNISIA.
DNC 09.
VESSEL  DISABLED AND ADRIFT, 35 PERSONS ON BOARD
IN VICINITY 33-36.00N 012-01.00E AT 201715Z FEB.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
